syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Chemistry 9701

subtopic.sub_topic_name: The gaseous state: ideal and real gases and pV = nRT

learning_objectives.description: explain the origin of pressure in a gas in terms of collisions between gas molecules and the wall of the container
understand that ideal gases have zero particle volume and no intermolecular forces of attraction
state and use the ideal gas equation pV = nRT in calculations, including in the determination of Máµ£
